entry.tran: （饮料）易使人醉的;（气氛、经历等）令人兴奋的
entry.def: A heady drink, atmosphere, or experience strongly affects your senses, for example by making you feel drunk or excited.

example.ex: ...in the heady days just after their marriage...
example.tran: 在他们新婚燕尔的那些令人陶醉的日子里
